# ARCamera.TrackingState.normal

**Case**

Camera position tracking is providing optimal results.

## Declaration

```swift
case normal
```

## Determining the camera tracking status

- **ARCamera.TrackingState.notAvailable**: Camera position tracking is not available.
- **ARCamera.TrackingState.limited(_:)**: Tracking is available, but the quality of results is questionable.
- **ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason**: Causes of limited position-tracking quality.

items.description: Camera position tracking is not available.
items.name: ARCamera.TrackingState.notAvailable

items.description: Tracking is available, but the quality of results is questionable.
items.name: ARCamera.TrackingState.limited(_:)
